repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection organized into four series: Senior portraits; Senior portraits and candid photographs; Special publications; and Senior candid photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains original photographs used in the annual production of the Jumbo Book. For some years there are senior portraits only, and for others there are candid shots as well. It also includes a special centennial edition.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Jumbo is the yearbook of the undergraduate colleges of Tufts University. It has been published annually since 1916, though the the title "The Jumbo" was first used for the 1917 edition. Over the years it has been known alternately as the Jumbo Book or simply Jumbo. In later years the yearbooks are often untitled.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish.
No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

controlaccess.subject: Student life
Student Activities -- Student Publishing
Student life
Student Activities -- Student Government, Clubs, and Organizations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains senior portraits of members of the Class of 2001.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains senior portraits of members of the Class of 2003. This series also contains candid photographs submitted by students for use in the yearbook. Photos that were used are grouped by page number. Photos that were not used are grouped at the end of the series.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged alphabetically and by page number.

did.unittitle: Unpublished candids, athletics: baseball, basketball, track
Unpublished candids, athletics: sailing, crew, tennis, soccer

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the Centennial History of Tufts College, published by the Jumbo Book in 1952 as a supplement to that year's yearbook.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains candid shots from the classes of 2004 and 2005. The candid photographs were submitted by students for use in the yearbook. Those in the collection may have been used in the yearbook, but were not picked up by students at the end of the year. They are unorganized.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Many of these images are of Campus organizations.
